relation: I pay about 3,000 dollars a semester so in the grand sceme of things this is an awesome price.
The classes are college classes. so some of them can be tough, but just what anyone would expect.
This is a great school the online learning is excellant, just make sure that you manage your time appropriately.
This is a great college. The online learning is excellant and allows you to work on your time. I am ery impressed with this college.
pageTitle: SUNY Empire State College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
textBeforeTable: 07/23/2009 Reviewer is Accepted here and planning to attend soon. Reviewer has not been to campus. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful. 1 of 37 D from holliswood, NY Check out reviews left by other students or leave your own review. textAfterTable: Categories Comments Campus Safety I do not know yet but I am sure it is up to standards. Greek Life I am not sure what their sororities are. Clubs and Activities I do not know the answer to this question yet; however I do know there is a work study program, so I am sure there are clubs and actives for the students to get involved in. I hope to get involved in a business club. Great for these types of students Empire is great for students who like to learn on their own and who do not need a lot of baby sitting. I was also informed it is for students who take imitative and who are motivated. Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus The campus is a small building. It is not very big. It has a few rooms in it. I believe the one in Rochester is a lot bigger, that is where there is a lot of face-to-face meeting occur. Bang for the buck Empire we will meet with our mentor once a week or
